attributes.action: Remove The Statue Of Cromwell From Outside Westminster Hall
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Please remove the statue of Oliver Cromwell from outside Westminster Hall and all other locations in the UK.
I find it wholly inappropriate and highly offensive to my beliefs.
Whilst you’re at it, please remove the statue of John Hampden from Aylesbury town centre, Buckinghamshire, and his effigy from the local councils livery.
If the statues are to remain in place, please add plaques detailing his actions during and after the civil war with regards to the unjust execution of King Charles I, the enforcement of Puritan ideals, the subjugation of Catholicism, the actions of his troops after Edgehill and his subsequent oppression and murder of civilians in Ireland (with specific mention to Dublin and Drogheda).
